attributes.action: STOP ENCOURAGING AVIATION EXPANSION - FLYING IS THE FASTEST GROWING SOURCE OF CARBON EMISSIONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Aviation is the fastest-growing source of greenhouse-gas emissions, already accounting for eight million tonnes of carbon dioxide each year - more than 10 per cent of the UK total. If we do not try to cut carbon emissions, by the end of the century, human civilisation will have almost been wiped out, with only a few groups of survivors clinging to life near the poles (according to a recent report).

And the government give the flying industry £9 BILLION in tax breaks. That's enough to buy over 30 new hospitals, build 2,000 new schools, put at least 450,000 new police on the beat, and pay the tuition fees of over 3 million students!

Most flights, especially short haul flights, are completely unnessecary.
Taking the train is ten times better for the environment.

please don't destroy our planet
